Event information

General info

On Saturday, July 28, Electronic Family will bring the best trance DJs from all over the world to Den Bosch. But there’s so much more! Enjoy our beach, the delicious food, the chill areas (with hammocks!) and cocktails to share with your friends.

If you want to experience Electronic Family to the fullest, stay with us and design your ticket+hotel package today!

Hassel free service

Please contact us for questions and special wishes at info@eventagent.nl or WhatsApp on:
+31(0)6 52 382 382.

You will receive your hotel reservation and official E-tickets straight after you have completed your booking.

Date and time

Electronic Family 2018 is a one-day event and will take place on Saturday 28th of July.

Show starts: 12h Show ends: 23h

Afterparty starts: 23h (Family ticket only)
Afterparty ends: 01h (Family ticket only)
